name: Lumina
description: Notes of apricot, pear and lemongrass.

name: Grandar
description: Crackery sweetness balanced with hops, floral and herbal notes that finish with a subtle citrus. Step mashed and hopped with nobles.

name: Edo
description: Crisp, gentle, and easy drinking from a rice malt base, this lager has floral and herbal notes, finishing dry and refreshingly smooth.

name: Akko
description: Pineapple and orange mango, notes of peach ring candies.

name: Tides
description: Mango, passionfruit, lime zest, citrus, and blueberry.

name: Rubico II
description: Pillowy soft with a full, creamy body, ripe mango, passionfruit, and juicy peach.

name: Origen
hops: Citra, Rakau, Nelson Sauvin, Southern Cross, Southern Cross SubZero Hop Kief

name: Capax
hops: Citra, Rakau, Wakatu, Rakau Hop Kief

name: Double Lupula
description: More hops, more malt, more everything. Everything Lupula is and more.

name: Harvest
description: Gooseberry with vinous and tropical fruit character. Bright lime and passionfruit notes.
hops: Citra, Motueka, Nelson Sauvin, Maui Nelson Hop Kief

name: Faust 25
description: Unfiltered 2025 vintage. Slightly sour, dry and oaky. Aged 18 months in oak foeders on our house microflora and conditioned on plums.
